title: Looking For Silver 4+ Players to make a 5man team for Dynamic q
body:
Hey so im silver 4, i can play top/jngle/adc/support pretty well (but bot lane is my strongest lane) im here to find 4 people to play Dynamic q, Iv been in Gold for a short time in pre-seaons when adc's were all that mattered and my aim is to get gold again. Add me if you are silver 4+ and actually keen to climb (no raging to hard, no flaming people on team or ill just delete u after game) would prefer if u had skype or something to voice chat on. All roles are open and ill play fill.

IGN: PG BadLife

replies.body: not silver yet because i dont have a teeam to hold on and trust but i have over 2000 games. lets give it a try. main jgl
Silver 4 jg and adc main, add for duo
